TopicTitle: Resume to help some one with mods.

Articles.Content:
Hi, Didn't know where to post this.

I have experience modding games. More specifically IL2.

Software i used: 3dsmax, Gimp, Notepad

Unfortunately for me i didn't (And even thought i have a better under standing still don't) know java. And with out it was impossible to release a completed or even semi completed mod.

And because of this NONE saw the light of day. This is why i want to help someone rather then go on it on my own (To hopefully see some come through)

(Well that's not completely true. I did have some that were released but none were my full creation but rather programs who didn't know how to complete the process. so i did favors for them so they would return the favor for me.. Which they never did... Grrrr.)

Here are some pics that i still had on my photobucket.

Im looking to provide you free labor!

thank you

-Stuff

Hello!

Nice work. I used to play that game quite a bit, must have a copy lying around somewhere..

You're more than welcome to join us over here if it's something you're interested in:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-WIP-PARTS-PLUGIN-0-23-5-Kerbal-Foundries-wheelpack-anti-grav-repulsors

Welcome to KSP modding
Maybe it is time that someone would work on better environments in KSP. I mean, it is not about the looks, but no harm done in more realistic looking worlds, right?

Wow!

I have a radical suggestion: you modded Il-2? Mod plane parts here.

For example, some nice inline and radial engines, canopies, landing gear...

I've been focusing on airplanes a lot recently, and would love to get more plane parts in.

Awesome work!

I believe most of the modders in the forums would appreciate any help.
